name: KeyboardEvent.isComposing
description: The KeyboardEvent.isComposing read-only property returns a Boolean value indicating if the event is fired within a composition session, i.e. after compositionstart and before compositionend.

refs.name: UI Events
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.prototype.isComposing' in the 'UI Events' specification.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.prototype.isComposing' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification' specification.
